briefTitle: Effects of a Telerehabilitation Intervention in the Management of Complications After Breast Cancer Surgery
officialTitle: Effects of a Telerehabilitation Intervention in the Management of Complications After Breast Cancer Surgery: Randomized Controlled Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* diagnosis of breast cancer
* Having undergone quadrantectomy or mastectomy surgery
* Age \> 18 years
* Signature of informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Neurological deficits with sensorimotor impairment of the upper limb
* Cognitive deficits that prevent the completion of questionnaires (MMSE\>24)
